title: compiler error - matchit 0.5.0

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code None, the error happened while compiling a dependency. ### Meta ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (750bd1a7f 2022-09-14) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` and ``` rustc 1.65.0-nightly (cf9ed0dd5 2022-09-15) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` ### Error output ``` 03:04:11 Compiling matchit v0.5.0 03:04:12 error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued 03:04:12 03:04:12 error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:345 ~ tower[963a]::balance::pool::{impl#3}::build) (CanonicalUserTypeAnnotation { user_ty: Canonical { max_universe: U0, variables: [CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }, CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Ty(General(U0)) }], value: tower[963a]::balance::p2c::service::{impl#1}), self_ty: balance::p2c::service::Balance<^2, ^3> }) }) }, span: tower[963a]::balance::p2c::service::{impl#1}), self_ty: balance::p2c::service::Balance<_, _> }) }, type_of=fn(D) -> balance::p2c::service::Balance {balance::p2c::service::Balance::::new}): NoSolution
